name: Void Climbers
description:
Void Climbers is a short game I developed for  Ludum Dare 47  game jam, the theme was Stuck in a loop so the game takes place on a never ending mountain.

You are a treasure hunter decided to climb to the top of a snowy mountain and claim the treasure, the main mechanic of the game is a grappling hook that you can use to stick to walls and climb to high places.

I wanted to play around with joints in unity and so I did, I hope you enjoy!
